title: The Waldorf needs to do a better job on maintenance
text: This is a beautiful hotel in the heart of Beijing. I would have given it 5* except for the fact that it took the hotel 3 days to rectify a shower that wasn't draining properly. We had a flood in the bathroom twice because this wasn't fixed. Thank god the hotel was very generous with their towels as there was a lot of water to be cleaned up. The staff was very friendly and most helpful. The food was fairly good but very expensive.
